title: Authorization migration tasks stuck at Running status
content:
After you start the authorization migration process, some authorization migration tasks are stuck at the Running status for an excessive amount of time.

Cause

The cause for this issue is unknown.

Solution

  1. Obtain the following logs from both the xruntime-platform pod and the xruntime-platform-offline pod (located in the <logging-volume>/logs/xservices/platform/${platform-pod}/maas directory):
    • maas_authorization_convergence.log
    • maas_authorization_convergence_idm_access.log
    • maas_error.log
  2. Open a support ticket, and attach the log files to the ticket.
If you need to migrate authorization for other tenants, you can cancel this migration job because you canÂ only run migration jobs on one tenant at a time. To do this, click Cancel on the Authorization migration tab.
